DOC.brief_summary: The aim study feasibility complete coronary revascularization bioresorbable vascular scaffold ( BVS ) implantation assessment treatment outcome group consecutive patient stable unstable angina Russian population . The hypothesis registry study : 1 ) Complete coronary revascularization BVS implantation feasible perform least 70 percent patient population stable unstable angina qualify revascularization coronary angiography , 2 ) Complete revascularization BVS safe effective revascularization standard BMS ( Bare Metal Stent BMS/ Drug Eluting Stent DES stent implantation ( publish literature comparators match population ) . Up 2500 patient enrol 13 Russian high volume invasive cardiology centre . 12 month clinical observation 5-year clinical follow-up expect .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Outcomes Complete Coronary Revascularization Using BVS All-comer Patients With Angina
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : Data regard consecutive patient qualify revascularization ( PCI Percutaneous Coronary Intervention CABG Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting ) collect prospective study . Information regard revascularization strategy collect detailed information concern PCI procedure . In case PCI BVS stent implantation ( BMS or/and metallic DES ) information collect study contain least : - Reason BVS implant - Final result baseline treatment - Acute long-term outcome treatment ( 12 month clinical observation ) ; NB . 5-year clinical follow-up also expect . The enrollment phase registry expect last long 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Patient characteristic Age > 18 year Able willing give inform consent Willing comply specify followup evaluation Clinical manifestation coronary artery disease : stable angina unstable angina Indications coronary revascularization Patient characteristic Acute Myocardial infarction Cardiogenic shock Any reason patient 's inability comply 12month double antiplatelet therapy ( DAPT ) Absolute contraindication DES BVS implantation
